character.name: Professor Calculus
character.systemPrompt: You are Professor Calculus, a brilliant engineering professor who speaks with precision and loves explaining technical concepts with enthusiasm.

location.description: A modern engineering building with labs, workshops, and innovative design spaces

clues: Glass walls reveal students working on robotics projects inside
The building's name honors a famous computer science pioneer
3D printers and CNC machines hum constantly in the maker spaces
Solar panels cover portions of the distinctive angular roof
easyClues: Students build robots and machines here
It's one of the newer buildings on campus

character.name: Frank Lloyd Wright
character.systemPrompt: You are Frank Lloyd Wright, the legendary architect, speaking with passion about design, form, and the harmony between buildings and nature.

location.description: A striking modernist library with distinctive concrete architecture and study spaces

clues: Brutalist concrete towers rise like geometric monuments
Students climb external staircases between different levels
Thousands of books and study carrels fill the interior floors
The building's stark design divides opinion across campus
easyClues: It's where students go to study and find books
The building looks like concrete blocks stacked together

levels.levelName: College of Agriculture, Food & Environmental Sciences

character.name: Old West Cowboy
character.systemPrompt: You are an Old West cowboy who worked these lands long ago, speaking with folksy wisdom about the history and traditions of California ranching.

location.description: Agricultural fields and barns where students learn hands-on farming and animal husbandry

clues: Holstein cows graze in pastures visible from the main road
Red barns house dairy operations and feed storage
Students in boots and work clothes tend to various livestock
The smell of hay and fresh earth fills the air
easyClues: You can see cows and other farm animals here
It smells like a working farm

character.name: Coach Victory
character.systemPrompt: You are Coach Victory, an enthusiastic athletic coach who speaks with energy about teamwork, perseverance, and Mustang pride.

location.description: A large outdoor stadium with green turf and seating for thousands of cheering fans

clues: Green artificial turf stretches between white yard lines
Aluminum bleachers can seat thousands of cheering fans
A large scoreboard displays the Mustang logo prominently
The press box overlooks the field from the home side
easyClues: This is where the football team plays their games
It has a big field with goal posts at each end

character.name: Fitness Guru Maya
character.systemPrompt: You are Fitness Guru Maya, an energetic wellness coach who speaks with enthusiasm about health, fitness, and living an active lifestyle.

location.description: A modern fitness facility with pools, climbing walls, and exercise equipment

clues: The sound of barbells clanking echoes from the weight room
A tall climbing wall challenges students to reach new heights
Swimmers do laps in the crystal-clear pool lanes
Basketball courts host pickup games throughout the day
easyClues: Students come here to work out and stay fit
You can swim, climb, and lift weights here

character.name: Campus DJ
character.systemPrompt: You are Campus DJ, a charismatic student who knows all the campus events and speaks with hip, current slang about student life and campus culture.

location.description: A central outdoor plaza where students gather, eat, and attend events

clues: Food trucks line up serving everything from tacos to bubble tea
Students sprawl on grass with laptops and textbooks
A stage hosts live music and campus events regularly
The smell of various cuisines mingles in the open air
easyClues: This is where students hang out and eat lunch
There are often food trucks and events here

character.name: Dean Wellington
character.systemPrompt: You are Dean Wellington, a distinguished academic administrator who speaks formally and knowledgeably about Cal Poly's history, traditions, and institutional values.

location.description: A stately brick building housing the university's main administrative offices

clues: Red brick walls reflect the California Mission architectural style
Important university decisions are made in the boardroom upstairs
Nervous students wait in the registrar's office with paperwork
Portrait paintings of past university presidents line the hallways
easyClues: This is where the university's main offices are located
Students come here for official paperwork and meetings

character.name: Madame Crescendo
character.systemPrompt: You are Madame Crescendo, a dramatic theater director who speaks with theatrical flair and passion about the arts, creativity, and self-expression.

location.description: An elegant venue for concerts, plays, and artistic performances

clues: Red velvet curtains frame the grand stage inside
Musicians practice scales and arpeggios in soundproof rooms
Costume racks overflow with period pieces and theatrical props
The lobby displays posters advertising upcoming performances
easyClues: Students perform plays and concerts in this building
It has a big theater with a stage and red curtains
